long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Network is an HTML5 puzzle game where players connect nodes to create a complete circuit. It tests problem-solving skills.
The Network is a challenging and exciting HTML5 game perfect for players who love a good puzzle. In the game, players must use their problem-solving skills to connect all the nodes in the Network and create a complete circuit. The gameplay is on a scrolling screen. And the player moves the nodes by clicking and dragging them with the mouse.
The game's objective is to connect all the nodes in the Network to create a complete circuit. To do this, players must use the nodes to create a path between all the nodes, starting from the source node and ending at the destination node. The route must be completed without overlapping lines or disconnected nodes. And players must be careful to avoid creating any dead ends.
One of the key features of Network is its colorful and vibrant graphics, which are full of personality and charm. The game's easy-to-use controls and straightforward gameplay make it perfect for players of all ages.
Overall, Network is a fun and addictive HTML5 game that keeps players entertained for hours. Its challenging gameplay, various game modes, and easy-to-use controls make it a must-play for anyone looking for a brain-teasing and engaging game.

To swipe Install this extension to play the Network Game or offline with no additional downloads and no ads. 

You can contact us at support@724fun.com and share your thoughts and problems

After clicking the add the game to chrome button, you can find the game in the extensions section. If you wish, you can visit 724fun.com. If you wish, you can play again and if you want to remove it, you can remove it from the extensions section.
